patterns: Which credit cards do you accept?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard, RuPay and AMEX

patterns: What are the products that you provide?
How can you help us with your products?
responses:
We offer a whole range of insurance solutions. Which of these categories interest you?
Term Insurance
Endowment Plans
Whole Life Plans
Pension Plans
Health Plans
Children Plans
.
Term Insurance is a non-linked, non-participating, pure risk premium plan which is available only through online channel.

You can call our call center 9951710970 .

Our customer service phone line is available 24/7.

patterns: what endowment plans do you offer?
responses: Endowment Plan is a non-linked, participating, individual, life assurance savings plan.

patterns: what whole life plans do you offer?
responses: whole life premium non-linked, participating, individual, life assurance savings plan.

patterns: What are features of whole life plan?
responses:
Key Features.
	Entry Age: 90 years
	No limit for Maximum Sum Assured
	Immediate commencement of Risk for children aged 8 or more years

patterns: What are benefits of whole life plan?
responses:
Key Benefits.
	Life long risk coverage till age 100
	Bonus throughout the term
	Option to take death benefit in instalments
	Optional Rider Benefits

patterns: What are features of term insurance?
responses:
Key Features
	Entry Age: 18 years
	No limit for Maximum Sum Assured
	Various premium payment options viz., Regular, Limited or Single Premium.

patterns: What are benefits of term insurance?
responses:
Key Benefits
	Coverage for all deaths
	Optional Rider Benefits
	Option to take death benefit in instalments.

patterns: what are features of endowment plans?
responses:
Key Features
	Entry Age: 90 days
	Immediate commencement of Risk for children aged 8 or more years
	No limit for Maximum Sum Assured.

patterns: What are benefits of endowment plans?
responses:
Key Benefits
	Participation in Profits
	Optional Rider Benefits
	Option to take death/maturity benefit in instalments
	Availability of loan facility.

patterns: what pension plans do you offer?
responses: Pension Plan is a non-linked, non-participating, single premium, deferred annuity plan.

patterns: what are features of pension plans?
responses:
Key Features
	Guaranteed annuity rates at the inception of the policy
	Can be bought both online as well as offline
	The joint life annuity can be taken between any two lineal descendant/ascendant of a family (i.e. Grandparent, Parent, Children, Grandchildren) or spouse or siblings.

patterns: What are benefits of pension plans?
responses:
Key Benefits
	Guaranteed Additions during the deferment period
	Various annuity options and mode of payment available
	Incentive for higher purchase price
	Rebate of 2% by way of increase in annuity for online purchase.

patterns: what health plans do you offer?
responses:
Here are our Health Plans:
	Cancer Cover(Online).
	Aarogya.

A regular premium payment health insurance plan which provides financial protection in case the Life Assured is diagnosed with any of the specified Early and/or Major Stage Cancer during the policy term.

A unique non-participating non-linked plan which provides health insurance cover against certain specified health risks and provides you with timely support in case of medical emergencies and helps you and your family remain financially independent in difficult times.

patterns: what children plans do you offer?
responses: New Children Money back Plan is a non-linked, participating, Individual, Life Assurance savings money back type plan designed to meet educational and other financial needs of children.

patterns: what are features of children plans?
responses:
Key Features
	Entry Age: 0 years
	Min. Basic sum Assured: No limit
	Immediate commencement of Risk for children aged 8 or more years.

patterns: What are benefits of children plans?
responses:
Key Benefits
	Participation in Profits
	Settlement Option for Maturity Benefit
	Option to take death benefit in instalments
	Availability of loan facility.

patterns: How can I predict the claim?
where to calculate the claim prediction?
responses: You can go to our website and select the option of Claim Prediction to predict your claim amount.

patterns: what all details required for predicting the claim?
responses:
Details required:
	Age
	Sex
	Body Mass Index(BMI)
	No Of Children
	Smoker or Not
